entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 7:30 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then periods of ice pellets or freezing rain beginning overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Freezing drizzle or drizzle. High 8.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle or periods of drizzle ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 6 April 2023
